author: Reuters Editorial
title: ITG Releases January 2018 U.S. Trading Volumes And Provides International Trading Commission Update
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Investment Technology Group Inc:
* ITG RELEASES JANUARY 2018 U.S. TRADING VOLUMES AND PROVIDES INTERNATIONAL TRADING COMMISSION UPDATE
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - ‍JANUARY 2018 U.S. TRADING VOLUME WAS 2.8 BILLION SHARES COMPARED TO 2.7 BILLION SHARES IN DECEMBER 2017​
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - JAN 2018 AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME (ADV) WAS 132 MILLION SHARES, COMPARED TO ADV OF OF 133 MILLION SHARES IN DECEMBER 2017
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - ‍ITG‘S AVERAGE REVENUE CAPTURE PER SHARE IN JANUARY 2018 WAS IN LINE WITH Q4 OF 2017​
